testcase.name: AddPlayer > postPlayer is dispatched when form is submitted with played info
AddPlayer > clears the input when the form is submitted
ListPlayer > renders a list item with the player's id as its id
ListPlayer > displays the player name inside the anchor element
ListPlayer > calls the onClick prop with the player id when the link is clicked
ListPlayers > renders a list with id "players-list"
ListPlayers > renders a ListPlayer for each player in the players prop
RequestStatus component > should render the component, inside which is an element with id 'request-status'
RequestStatus component > should render the component with the correct status
SelectedPlayer component > should render active player data correctly
SelectedPlayer component > should render inactive player data correctly
SelectedPlayer component > should not render if selected player is null
Testing action creators > setStatus: > returns an action with type SET_REQUEST_STATUS to the frontends reducers along with the payload (String) that is given as a param
Testing action creators > setSelectedPlayer: > returns an action with type SET_SELECTED_PLAYER to the frontends reducers along with the payload (Object) that is given as a param
Testing action creators > clearSelectedPlayer: > returns an action with type CLEAR_SELECTED_PLAYER to the frontends reducers
Testing action creators > setPlayers: > returns an action with type SET_PLAYERS to the frontends reducers
Testing action creators > addPlayer: > returns an action with type ADD_PLAYER to the frontends reducers
Testing action creators > removePlayer: > returns an action with type REMOVE_PLAYER to the frontends reducers
playersReducer > should return the initial state when no matching type in switch-case
playersReducer > should handle SET_PLAYERS by returning its payload
playersReducer > should handle ADD_PLAYER by adding it to the state
playersReducer > should handle REMOVE_PLAYER by removing a player whose id === payload from the store
statusReducer > should return the initial state when no matching type in switch-case
statusReducer > Payload loading: should handle SET_STATUS by returning REQ_STATUS[loading]
statusReducer > Payload success: should handle SET_STATUS by returning REQ_STATUS[success]
statusReducer > Payload error: should handle SET_STATUS by returning REQ_STATUS[error]
selectedPlayerReducer > should return the initial state when no matching type in switch-case
selectedPlayerReducer > should handle SET_SELECTED_PLAYER by returning payload
selectedPlayerReducer > should handle CLEAR_SELECTED_PLAYER by returning payload
Testing thunk action creators > postPlayer: > SUCCESS CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success), addPlayer(expectedResponse) and clearSelectedPlayer()
Testing thunk action creators > postPlayer: > FAIL CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.error)
Testing thunk action creators > getPlayers: > SUCCESS CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success), setPlayers(expectedResponse)
Testing thunk action creators > getPlayers: > FAIL CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success)
Testing thunk action creators > getSelectedPlayer: > SUCCESS CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success), setSelectedPlayer(expectedResponse)
Testing thunk action creators > getSelectedPlayer: > FAIL CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.error)
Testing thunk action creators > deleteSelectedPlayer: > SUCCESS CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success), removePlayer(selectedPlayer.id), clearSelectedPlayer()
Testing thunk action creators > deleteSelectedPlayer: > FAIL CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.error)
Testing thunk action creators > updateSelectedPlayer: > SUCCESS CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.success), updatePlayer(expectedResponse), clearSelectedPlayer()
Testing thunk action creators > updateSelectedPlayer: > FAIL CASE: dispatch setStatus(REQ_STATUS.loading), setStatus(REQ_STATUS.error)
